scripts.build: pnpm dlx wrangler@latest types && pnpm dlx wrangler@latest build
scripts.dev: pnpm migrate:local && pnpm dlx wrangler@latest dev
scripts.migrate:local: pnpm dlx wrangler@latest d1 migrations apply DB --local
scripts.migrate:remote: pnpm dlx wrangler@latest d1 migrations apply DB --remote
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && pnpm migrate:remote && pnpm dlx wrangler@latest deploy
scripts.test:all: pnpm test && pnpm test:python && pnpm test:browser-rendering
scripts.schema:export: pnpm dlx wrangler@latest d1 execute DB --command="SELECT sql FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name;" --local > docs/d1_schemas/local-schema-$(date +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S).sql
scripts.schema:export:remote: pnpm dlx wrangler@latest d1 execute DB --command="SELECT sql FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name NOT LIKE 'sqlite_%' ORDER BY name;" --remote > docs/d1_schemas/remote-schema-$(date +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S).sql
scripts.python:test:setup: cd python-node/JobSpy && python -m pip install pytest pytest-cov uvicorn fastapi
scripts.db:backup: pnpm dlx wrangler@latest d1 export DB --output=backups/db-backup-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).sql --remote
scripts.db:restore: pnpm dlx wrangler@latest d1 import DB --file=backups/latest-backup.sql --remote
scripts.logs:tail:errors: pnpm dlx wrangler@latest tail --format=pretty | grep -i error
scripts.clean:all: pnpm clean && rm -rf node_modules/ python-node/JobSpy/__pycache__/ python-node/JobSpy/.pytest_cache/
